pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Passive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() $(e)Plains$(). $(e)Plains$() in $(6)Village Mania().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 1-3 $(item)Raw Beef$(), 1-3 $(item)Cooked Beef$() if killed with fire, 0-2 $(item)Leather$(), 2-4 $(item)Apple$(), 1-2 $(item)Golden Apple$(), 1 $(item)Enchanted Golden Apple$()

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Often called an urban legend, few Enchanted Golden Apple Cows have been seen in the wild. As they are an extremely rare type of Apple Cow to find. So, if you see one, harbor it and keep it safe! Or, unless you want some of those Enchanted Golden Apples that it contains within itself.
